title: Vaishnavi Kundan Haaram - Emerald & Polki Diamond Necklace
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (పోల్కి వజ్రాలు) - GH Color
features: Kundan setting (కుందన్ అమరిక) showcases the brilliance of the Polki diamonds. Features alternating floral motifs and geometric patterns. Pear shaped emeralds and large polki diamonds set at center enhance the royal look. The design uses traditional craftsmanship from Jaipur with a modern Hyderabadi twist. Intricate Meenakari work on the reverse side adds a hidden detail of artistry (మీనాకారీ పని).
occasions: and special festive occasions (పండుగలు). Ideal for Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం)
description: A timeless piece combining heritage with modern elegance. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and Zambian emeralds ensures enduring beauty and value. Handcrafted by skilled artisans with generations of expertise. Represents a treasured investment and a symbol of status.
